components.description:
A person juggling between three and five colored balls. The person shown in this emoji wears a hat on most major platforms.

Early Twitter and Facebook designs previously displayed this emoji as a pair of disembodied hands juggling three colored balls.
components.title: Juggling

components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description: A circle shown with a crossed vertical line beneath it, used as a representation for women. Often used on International Women's Day.
components.title: Female Sign

description: A woman juggling between three and five colored balls. The person shown in this emoji wears a hat on most major platforms.
title: Woman Juggling

emoji_net_data.definition: The Woman Juggling emoji is a sequence of the ?? Juggling, ? Female Sign and ? Variation Selector-16 emojis. These are combined using a zero http://emojipedia.org/woman-juggling/
emoji_net_data.name: woman juggling

bn:13674016v: To handle multiple tasks at once.

bn:00001530n: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)

bn:00048524n: Juggling is a physical skill, performed by a juggler, involving the manipulation of objects for recreation, entertainment, art, or sport.
Moving of objects in an artful manner.
Throwing and catching several objects simultaneously
The art of moving objects, such as balls, clubs, beanbags, rings, etc. in an artful or artistic manner.

apple_vendor_description: The woman juggling emoji on Apple devices portrays a dynamic figure in mid-action, expertly keeping multiple colorful objects aloft with graceful movement. Apple's design language imbues her with smooth gradients and realistic lighting, making the juggling balls appear almost tangible and the woman's focus palpable. This emoji vividly represents multitasking, handling multiple responsibilities, or achieving a state of effortless coordination, all with Apple's characteristic polish.
